text: Kasone az sumo, ki hamsaroni xesro [az lihozi hurmati hamʙistari hamcun] modari xud talaqqi mekunand, [ʙidonand, ki] on zanon hargiz modaronason naxohand ʙud; modaroni eson faqat zanone hastand, ki onhoro ʙa dunjo ovardaand. Onon suxane nopisand va nohaq megujand va [agar tavʙa kunand] Alloh taolo ʙaxsojandai omurzgor ast
